name: blinko
description: Blinko is a privacy-first, plain text note-taking and publishing tool that organizes content as markdown files. It focuses on fast writing, local storage, and simple publishing, ideal for journals, blogs, and personal portfolios.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write and organize notes in markdown format. Simple and portable

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Local storage keeps your notes completely private. No cloud dependency

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Optimized interface for quick note-taking. Minimal friction

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Full markdown formatting for rich content. Flexible formatting

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Notes stored as plain markdown files. Easy backup and migration

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Fast, responsive performance without bloat. Efficient design
